-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://github.com/pgadmin-org/pgadmin4/issues/new/choose if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.complete_unit_material
(
    cum_id serial NOT NULL,
    quantity integer NOT NULL,
    orders_id integer NOT NULL,
    ml_id integer NOT NULL,
    ms_description_id integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT complete_unit_material_pkey PRIMARY KEY (cum_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.material_length
(
    ml_id serial NOT NULL,
    length integer NOT NULL,
    material_id integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT material_length_pkey PRIMARY KEY (ml_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.material_setup_descriptions
(
    msd_id serial NOT NULL,
    description character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT material_setup_descriptions_pkey PRIMARY KEY (msd_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.materials
(
    material_id serial NOT NULL,
    name character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    unit_name character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    meter_price numeric NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT materials_pkey PRIMARY KEY (material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.orders
(
    order_id serial NOT NULL,
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    carport_width integer NOT NULL,
    carport_length integer NOT NULL,
    carport_height integer,
    date date NOT NULL,
    total_price numeric NOT NULL,
    status integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT orders_pkey PRIMARY KEY (order_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.users
(
    user_id serial NOT NULL,
    email character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    password character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    tlf integer NOT NULL,
    is_admin boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
    address character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    zip_code integer,
    CONSTRAINT users_pkey PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.zip_codes
(
    zip_code integer NOT NULL,
    city character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT zip_codes_pkey PRIMARY KEY (zip_code),
    CONSTRAINT unique_city UNIQUE (city)
        INCLUDE(city),
    CONSTRAINT unique_zip UNIQUE (zip_code)
        INCLUDE(zip_code)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.complete_unit_material
    ADD CONSTRAINT complete_unit_material_description_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (ms_description_id)
    REFERENCES public.material_setup_descriptions (msd_id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.complete_unit_material
    ADD CONSTRAINT complete_unit_material_ml_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (ml_id)
    REFERENCES public.material_length (ml_id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.complete_unit_material
    ADD CONSTRAINT complete_unit_material_orders_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (orders_id)
    REFERENCES public.orders (order_id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.material_length
    ADD CONSTRAINT material_length_material_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (material_id)
    REFERENCES public.materials (material_id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.orders
    ADD CONSTRAINT orders_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (user_id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.users
    ADD CONSTRAINT users_zip_code_fkey FOREIGN KEY (zip_code)
    REFERENCES public.zip_codes (zip_code) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
